contextId.occurrenceNote: These two opposite directions have the combined meaning of "everywhere." Alternate translation: "He looked all around" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: He looked this way and that way

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a merism that means food and drink. Alternate translation: "he will bless your food and drink" or "he will bless you by giving you food and drink" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-merism]])
contextId.glQuote: he will bless your bread and water
